there are a lot of really \*\*\* alara commons. [Vectis silencers](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vectis silencers), [Viashino skeleton](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Viashino skeleton), [Undead Leotau](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Undead Leotau), the list goes on.

posts.post_content:
Horrible, and strange beyond belief.
  
   
It is nuts enough that Serpents need foes to have Islands to attack (while no other aquatic creature does, and land creatures aren't inhibited by the Islands, etc.), but what does this represent? That Serpents can't find their foe unless they are led there by an artifact?
posts.html:
Horrible, and strange beyond belief.

It is nuts enough that Serpents need foes to have Islands to attack (while no other aquatic creature does, and land creatures aren't inhibited by the Islands, etc.), but what does this represent? That Serpents can't find their foe unless they are led there by an artifact?
